['Qualifications:', ' Responsibilities:• Hands-On contribution as part of a software engineering team focused on building and delivering highly secure, efficient and robust data processing solutions in an aggressive timeframe.• Develop and deploy data centric systems and pipelines on an AWS cloud-based platform• Partner with data Scientists to support and improve model development pipeline• Support a holistic and end to end approach to data, including querying, aggregation, deep analysis, visualization and AI/ML models• Integrate 3rd Party or Internal API and file-based services utilizing CSV, JSON, or XML data• Designing, developing and maintaining solutions to: source, integrate, transform, cleanse, normalize and expose / present data to various constituents / consumer groups such as other engineering groups, data science or other end users• Without fail deliver and maintain accurate, complete and current documentation• Own deliverables from ideation to production operationalization• Collaborate with data science, product and business teams to deliver superior functionalities• Diligently observe and maintain Standards for Regulatory Compliance and Information Security• Work closely with other teams to extract, transform and load data from wide variety of data sources, including in-house databases`Qualifications:• B.S. degree in Computer Science, Information Systems, Engineering or related discipline• Currently collaborating as a hands-on team member developing significant commercial software• 10+ years of software development experience building and testing applications in Java, Scala, and/or Python, including at least 2 years of experience leading development teams• 5+ years of experience in Postgres, Python, ETL technologies (Informatica, Talend, Tibco, etc)• 2+ years of experience building data pipelines• Current cloud technology experience, preferably including Docker/Kubernetes/OpenShift• Proven proficiency in building data processing systems in Java and Python, along with a willingness to learn new languages• Recent hands-on Experience supporting data science teams or supporting AI/ML based systems• Experience handling and processing sensitive data such as PII• A strong proven hands-on proficiency in SQL and NoSQL based data access and management• Experience working cross functionally with other teams outside of engineering• Knowledgeable and experienced with software and system patterns and their application in prior works• Demonstrable familiarity with CI/CD process, testing frameworks and practices• Extensive experience gathering and assessing specifications and requirements• Comfortable in a dynamic environment, with ability to adapt to various technologies and simultaneously work on multiple projectsAdditional Preferred Experience• Extensive experience building systems supporting financial services businesses• Hands-on experience with Snowflake, as well as experience with Spark, Airflow, Nifi, or HDFS.• Experience supporting systems leveraging with Text Analytics and NLP (natural language processing) techniques• Ability to initiate and drive projects from ideation to implementation• Understanding of current trends in AI/ML based system development• Knowledge and/or use of FDX, OFX, and/or FIX• Security and privacy compliance (GPDR, CCPA, ISO 27001, PCI, HIPAA, etc.) experience', 'Responsibilities:', ' ', 'This a 12 months+ contract opportunity! It is currently remote but will eventually be onsite in Costa Mesa Ca. All candidates must be local. All candidates must be Greencard holders or US Citizen. ', 'Greencard holders or US Citizen.', 'Additional Preferred Experience']

['', 'What is the role?', 'You have full-stack software engineering experienceYou have 3-5 years of experienceYou have strong experience with JavaScript and JavaScript frameworks such as typescript and ReactYou care about building clear, maintainable codeYou have been key member of teams with a track record of building and operating successful products and platformsYou enjoy sports, pop culture, and live eventsAbout our Platform: Tally’s is an evolving consumer-facing platform that also leverages 3rd-party data partners and services. It is built on: node, react, typescript, postgres hosted on the AWS platform.', 'We have set out to do great things - and we need the best team to accomplish that. The best team to us will reflect the diversity of the sports fans and other audiences we are serving. To us a diverse, inclusive - and equitable - environment is closely linked to the success of our vision.', 'Develop an understanding of our system infrastructure', 'About our Platform: Tally’s is an evolving consumer-facing platform that also leverages 3rd-party data partners and services. It is built on: node, react, typescript, postgres hosted on the AWS platform.', 'Design and implement significant continuous integration and deployment practices', 'Participate in technical decisions for the Tally Engineering team', "You're great for this role because:", 'Design and implement technical architecture improvements', 'Tally Technology Group is a sports tech company and leading provider of predictive gaming solutions. Our mission is to find new ways for sports teams to engage with their fans and to create experiences that bring fans closer to their teams.\xa0', 'Work with engineering leadership and the other engineers to refine the Tally product, processes, and team practices', 'Our vision is to build a second screen experience for sports and other live events that allows teams, etc. to build a closer relationship with fans and to find ways to monetize those relationships - be it through sponsorships, advertising or partnership with sport books.\xa0', '\u200d', 'Within your first three months, you will:', 'You have been key member of teams with a track record of building and operating successful products and platforms', 'Develop significant new functionality for our back-end and/or front-end services', 'You have 3-5 years of experience', 'Spend time with other engineers as well as with the business side in order to understand our platform, current initiatives, goals, and challenges, as well as to understand the business we are in.', 'Within your first nine months, you will:', 'Develop a deep understanding of the business environment and strategy', 'As a Senior Software Engineer (full time), you will be a key player in developing and supporting our core product that delivers prediction games to sports fans world-wide. You will collaborate with other team members on developing new product features and will work with our game operators to ensure the game can be delivered to thousands of fans daily. You will play an integral role of shaping the future of our product.', 'You enjoy sports, pop culture, and live events', 'Who are we?', 'Within your first month, you will:', 'Participate in technical decisions for the Tally Engineering teamDesign and implement technical architecture improvementsDesign and implement significant continuous integration and deployment practices', 'Spend time with other engineers as well as with the business side in order to understand our platform, current initiatives, goals, and challenges, as well as to understand the business we are in.Begin implementing features from our backlog and improving software quality to familiarize yourself with our platform', 'You have full-stack software engineering experience', 'You have strong experience with JavaScript and JavaScript frameworks such as typescript and React', 'You care about building clear, maintainable code', 'Work with engineering leadership and the other engineers to refine the Tally product, processes, and team practicesDevelop significant new functionality for our back-end and/or front-end servicesDevelop a deep understanding of the business environment and strategyDevelop an understanding of our system infrastructure', 'Tally is a startup founded by Super Bowl Champion Russell Wilson and global tech leaders that is on an aggressive growth path and is looking to expand its engineering team. Our team works globally and you will be able to work remotely.', 'Begin implementing features from our backlog and improving software quality to familiarize yourself with our platform']

job_title: Senior Software Engineer : Big Data Storage
job_text: ['', 'Preferred: experience working with remote teams', 'Design and implement ETL pipelines by using one or many of the open source frameworks', 'Have you streamed a program on Disney+, caught the latest binge-worthy series on Hulu, or tuned in for NFL highlights on social media? If the answer is yes, you have already benefitted from Conviva’s technology.', 'Experience in data analysis and modeling', 'Conviva is the leader in streaming media intelligence, powered by its real-time platform. More than 250 industry leaders and brands – including CBS, CCTV, Cirque Du Soleil, DAZN, Disney+, HBO, Hulu, Sky, Sling TV, TED, Univision, and WarnerMedia – rely on Conviva to maximize their consumer engagement, deliver the quality experiences viewers expect and drive revenue growth. With a global footprint of more than 500 million unique viewers watching 150 billion streams per year across 3 billion applications streaming on devices, Conviva offers streaming providers unmatched scale for continuous video measurement, intelligence and benchmarking across every stream, every screen, every second. Conviva is privately held and headquartered in Silicon Valley, California, with offices around the world. For more information, please visit us at\xa0www.conviva.com.', 'What you get to do:', 'Provide positive culture influence over other team members with code quality, initiatives and execution', 'BS or streaming media growth worldwide. It’s not about the data, it’s about what you do with it. As the leader in global streaming media intelligence, Conviva measures in excess of 500 million unique viewers watching 150 billion streams per year with 1.5 trillion real-time transactions per day across more than 180 countries. Our platform and products are designed to deliver the real-time, cross-screen, integrated insights our customers need to understand their business and focus on what matters. Join us as we make streaming better.', 'BS or above in CS or related field', 'Conviva is the leader in streaming media intelligence, powered by its real-time platform. Conviva is privately held and headquartered in Silicon Valley, California, with offices around the world. For more information, please visit us at\xa0', 'Senior Software Engineer', 'Have passion and enthusiasm for big data technologies as well as building cutting edge solutions']

['', 'If you want to work with a tight-knit team of sharp technologists to leverage your talents and grow your skills, this is the role for you.', 'If you want to the long-term upside of an equity stake in a scalable business with the short-term upside of profit-sharing, this is the role for you.', 'The developer in this role will contribute to both our SaaS product as well as client-facing Services projects.', 'Company Description', 'Qualifications', 'Converge is a dynamic Marketing Reporting Automation Software Company in Atlanta, funded by Mark Cuban, that has navigated to profitability and is hiring for growth.', 'We are seeking Full Stack Software Developers to work on our Marketing Reporting Automation Platform and a variety of Products for an intriguing range of clients.', "Converge is conveniently located next to Georgia Tech's campus at Tech Square, but we are currently operating almost entirely as a remote team for the convenience and safety of our team.", 'We automate the collection and visualization of social media, digital, and offline marketing data, saving our clients time, increasing their accuracy and job satisfaction, and adding tremendous efficiency to the client reporting process.', 'This is a unique opportunity to work alongside an experienced team that excels at building Software as a Service (SaaS) products.', 'If you are interested in the mix of building a scalable Software-as-a-Service (SAAS) product and consulting for clients (no travel), this is the role for you.', 'We are hiring a Software Engineer to help accelerate our growth.', 'This is a challenging and varied technical role. Experience developing web applications in Ruby on Rails is ideal, though the role also requires a voracious appetite to learn and apply new skills. You should be skilled at building web-based software or mobile apps, and excel at learning new languages and frameworks.', 'Converge is a Marketing Reporting Automation platform that helps Digital Marketing Agencies increase the profitability, accuracy, and efficiency of the reporting they provide to clients every month.']

"Confidence can sometimes hold us back from applying for a job. But we'll let you in on a secret: there's no such thing as a 'perfect' candidate. HubSpot is a place where everyone can grow. So however you identify and whatever background you bring with you, please apply if this is a role that would make you excited to come into work every day.About HubSpotHubSpot helps millions of organizations grow better, and we’d love to grow better with you. Our business builds the software and systems that power the world’s small to medium-sized businesses. Our company culture builds connections, careers, and employee growth. How? By creating a workplace that values flexibility, autonomy, and transparency. If that sounds like something you’d like to be part of, we’d love to hear from you.You can find out more about our company culture in the HubSpot Culture Code, which has more than 4M views, and learn about our commitment to creating a diverse and inclusive workplace, too. Thanks to the work of every HubSpotter globally who has helped build our remarkable culture, HubSpot has been named a top workplace by Glassdoor, Fortune, Entrepreneur, and more.HubSpot was founded in 2006. job_title: Software Engineer in Test III (Java + Automation)
job_text: ['', ' Responsible for supporting test infrastructure of our software systems and components. Design, build, and maintain data-driven test automation tools and frameworks using clean coding practices and functional programming methodologies. Perform debugging and root cause analysis of product issues or defects. Perform system analysis, assess risk, and develop strong test strategies by analyzing product design and technical specifications, and by collaborating with product managers and developers. Integrate with deployment infrastructure to establish a continuous build and test cycle. Perform test environment set up and configuration. Evangelize new testing methodologies, best practices and tools with goals to continuously improve test coverage through automation. Report, document, and communicate failures discovered through testing with the affected teams. Work closely with developers in all phases of SDLC to build quality into our development process.', 'Email Your Resume In Word To', ' Perform system analysis, assess risk, and develop strong test strategies by analyzing product design and technical specifications, and by collaborating with product managers and developers.', 'Optello is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer', 'Please do NOT change the email subject line in any way. You must keep the JobID: linkedin : AY2-1583456 -- in the email subject line for your application to be considered.***', ' Responsible for supporting test infrastructure of our software systems and components.', ' Experience with test automation tools and libraries such as Selenium, TestNG, Junit, ScalaTest, and/or Gatling', ' Strong SQL query skills; and have recently created complex queries', ' Salary Stock options/RSUs Competitive Benefits 401k Matching Game room/TV Onsite Dry Cleaning & Alteration Service Company Organized Sports Leagues Happy Hours/BBQs Onsite Gym PTO Commuter FSA Program Healthy Catered Lunches Schedule flexibility - flexible with working from home 1 to 2 days per week.', ' PTO', ' 401k Matching', ' 3 to 6 years of experience developing test automation frameworks and tools', ' Strong knowledge of Unix and Linux (specifically Unix)', ' 3 to 6 years of experience developing test automation frameworks and tools Proficiency & strong knowledge in either of the programming languages; Java or Scala Experience with test automation tools and libraries such as Selenium, TestNG, Junit, ScalaTest, and/or Gatling Strong SQL query skills; and have recently created complex queries Strong knowledge of Unix and Linux (specifically Unix)', ' Schedule flexibility - flexible with working from home 1 to 2 days per week.', ' Work with cutting edge technologies and one of the most advanced products in the diagnostics industry Join a world-class Engineering/PM team with a solid work/life balance and great flexibility Growth, Our trajectory has been on a steady upswing. We are a continually growing and stable publicly-traded company (as of 2 years ago). Rewarding - Help families identify and manage genetic diseases Stock options/RSUs Work with a passionate, bright, uplifting, and a go-the-extra-mile for your colleague group.', ' Integrate with deployment infrastructure to establish a continuous build and test cycle.', ' Stock options/RSUs', ' Evangelize new testing methodologies, best practices and tools with goals to continuously improve test coverage through automation.', ' Onsite Dry Cleaning & Alteration Service', ' Company Organized Sports Leagues', ' Proficiency & strong knowledge in either of the programming languages; Java or Scala', ' Competitive Benefits', 'Your Right to Work', ' Work with cutting edge technologies and one of the most advanced products in the diagnostics industry', ' Report, document, and communicate failures discovered through testing with the affected teams.', ' Join a world-class Engineering/PM team with a solid work/life balance and great flexibility', ' Perform test environment set up and configuration.', ' Happy Hours/BBQs', ' Work closely with developers in all phases of SDLC to build quality into our development process.', ' Rewarding - Help families identify and manage genetic diseases', ' Design, build, and maintain data-driven test automation tools and frameworks using clean coding practices and functional programming methodologies.', ' Onsite Gym', ' Game room/TV', ' Salary', ' Perform debugging and root cause analysis of product issues or defects.', ' Healthy Catered Lunches', ' Commuter FSA Program', ' Growth, Our trajectory has been on a steady upswing. We are a continually growing and stable publicly-traded company (as of 2 years ago).', ' Work with a passionate, bright, uplifting, and a go-the-extra-mile for your colleague group.']

'Contribute to and promote good software engineering practices across team', 'As a Senior Software, Machine Learning Engineer you are a technical expert in dealing with terabytes of data and develop machine learning systems. You will use the latest techniques to solve challenging problems in the video streaming industry, such as anomaly detection and root cause analysis in QoE metrics at real time, online viewership forecasting, and QoE optimization. You will lead major initiatives in technology innovation and advancement, lead and contribute to the design and implementation of major new products and features with high quality in production that will have big business impact for years to come. You will also work across teams and organizations, help in establishing technical standards and driving the overall technical architecture and best engineering practices through design reviews, architecture discussions and other technical leader activities.', '5+ years of industry experience in software development', 'Architect, build, maintain, and improve new and existing suite of algorithms and their underlying systemsImplement end-to-end solutions for real-time and batch algorithms along with tooling around monitoring, logging, automated testing, performance testing and A/B testingServe as a technical lead on our most demanding projects that requires big data and ML knowledge and experiencesContribute to and promote good software engineering practices across team']

['', 'Ensure the reliability of systems essential to Imperfect customers and internal users', 'Collaborate with other team members to build personalization, recommendation and optimization algorithmsOwn the full software development lifecycle, from initial concepts, requirements gathering, development, testing, deployment and maintenanceActively contribute to team and company standardsPractice disciplined software engineering (e.g. automated testing, code reviews, and writing maintainable code)Ensure the reliability of systems essential to Imperfect customers and internal usersKeep up-to-date with the latest technology developments related to your domainFor more experienced applicants, ability to mentor other team members', 'Responsibilities:', "You're passionate about our mission to eliminate food waste and create a better food system for all", 'Imperfect Foods was founded in 2015 with a mission to reduce food waste and build a better food system for everyone. We offer imperfect (yet delicious) produce, affordable pantry items, and quality meat and dairy. We deliver them conveniently to our customers’ doorsteps and pride ourselves on offering up to a 30% discount compared to grocery store prices. Our customers can get the healthy, seasonal produce they want alongside the grocery staples they rely on, without having to compromise their budget or values. We’re proving that doing the right thing for the planet doesn’t have to cost more, and that shopping for quality ingredients can support the people and resources that it takes to grow our favorite foods.', '2+ years experience building and architecting large-scale, production quality backend systems in applied machine learning or data pipeline/warehousingUnderstanding of database schema design, caching and scalabilityExpertise with relational databases, such as PostgreSQLExperience with distributed, service-oriented systems communicating with RESTful API interfacesExperience with event sourcing, CQRS and asynchronous communication using queues is a plus', 'Skills and Qualifications:', '2+ years experience building and architecting large-scale, production quality backend systems in applied machine learning or data pipeline/warehousing', 'Experience with event sourcing, CQRS and asynchronous communication using queues is a plus', 'You have a sincere commitment to crafting maintainable, dependable systems', 'You have the willingness and ability to contribute to a team culture of quality', 'Practice disciplined software engineering (e.g. automated testing, code reviews, and writing maintainable code)', 'Keep up-to-date with the latest technology developments related to your domain', 'We have heaps of interesting problems to solve around customer experience, logistics, supply chain and scale. We’re looking for an experienced machine learning engineer to help us take the work out of grocery shopping by building our capabilities in personalization, recommendation engines, and business optimization.', 'About the Role:', 'Understanding of database schema design, caching and scalability', 'Our software engineering team builds the e-commerce platform and internal tooling that makes this all possible. Engineers don’t just build widgets -- we participate in the full lifecycle of a feature, from conception to release. We’re a remote-first team with members throughout the US. This role will report to the Engineering Manager for Data / Machine Learning.', "We're looking for folks who are positive, motivated, and ready to change the world. If that sounds like you, drop us a line!", 'Experience with distributed, service-oriented systems communicating with RESTful API interfaces', 'About Imperfect', 'Expertise with relational databases, such as PostgreSQL', 'Actively contribute to team and company standards', 'For more experienced applicants, ability to mentor other team members', 'You have a pragmatic, customer-centric approach to problem-solving', 'Own the full software development lifecycle, from initial concepts, requirements gathering, development, testing, deployment and maintenance', 'If owning the full product engineering lifecycle, sustainability, preventing food waste, and working daily with a bunch of pleasant people excites you, come join us!', "This is a remote position. We're headquartered in San Francisco with operations all over the country.", 'Collaborate with other team members to build personalization, recommendation and optimization algorithms', 'About You:', "You have a pragmatic, customer-centric approach to problem-solvingYou have a sincere commitment to crafting maintainable, dependable systemsYou have the willingness and ability to contribute to a team culture of qualityYou're passionate about our mission to eliminate food waste and create a better food system for all"]

Follow PCI best practices for securing credit card details.', 'Reporting to the Software Engineering Manager, we are seeking a Senior Java Developer to join our team of savvy technologists, ready to be a part of solving complex problems and deliver solutions that make life and work easier to those who use our products.', 'Technologies: multithreading, JDBC, servlets, JSP, TCP/IP, SOAP, REST, XML, JSON, HTML, CSS, security, encryption, open source, web development, web services, web protocols\xa0', 'At USAT we know that your job doesn’t necessarily define you, which is why we’re working hard at building a company culture that is diverse and inclusive, and celebrates people who are creative, motivated, curious, and inventive. ['', 'If you want to work with a tight-knit team of sharp technologists to leverage your talents and grow your skills, this is the role for you.', 'If you want to the long-term upside of an equity stake in a scalable business with the short-term upside of profit-sharing, this is the role for you.', 'The developer in this role will contribute to both our SaaS product as well as client-facing Services projects.', 'Company Description', 'Qualifications', 'Converge is a dynamic Marketing Reporting Automation Software Company in Atlanta, funded by Mark Cuban, that has navigated to profitability and is hiring for growth.', 'We are seeking Full Stack Software Developers to work on our Marketing Reporting Automation Platform and a variety of Products for an intriguing range of clients.', "Converge is conveniently located next to Georgia Tech's campus at Tech Square, but we are currently operating almost entirely as a remote team for the convenience and safety of our team.", 'We automate the collection and visualization of social media, digital, and offline marketing data, saving our clients time, increasing their accuracy and job satisfaction, and adding tremendous efficiency to the client reporting process.', 'This is a unique opportunity to work alongside an experienced team that excels at building Software as a Service (SaaS) products.', 'If you are interested in the mix of building a scalable Software-as-a-Service (SAAS) product and consulting for clients (no travel), this is the role for you.', 'We are hiring a Software Engineer to help accelerate our growth.', 'This is a challenging and varied technical role. Experience developing web applications in Ruby on Rails is ideal, though the role also requires a voracious appetite to learn and apply new skills. You should be skilled at building web-based software or mobile apps, and excel at learning new languages and frameworks.', 'Converge is a Marketing Reporting Automation platform that helps Digital Marketing Agencies increase the profitability, accuracy, and efficiency of the reporting they provide to clients every month.']

['', ' Corning succeeds through sustained investment in R&D, a unique combination of material and process innovation, and close collaboration with customers to solve tough technology challenges.', '\xa0', 'Work on the integration of radio interface functions with policy, session management and configuration subsystems.Support internal test and QA teams and external field support engineers to complete interoperability and acceptance testing in wireless operator networks.Participate in architecture, design and code reviews and provide peer feedback.Debug field issues through log analysis and other field data', ' Our Optical Communications segment has recently evolved from being a manufacturer of optical fiber and cable, hardware and equipment to being a comprehensive provider of industry-leading optical solutions across the broader communications industry.This segment is classified into two main product groupings – carrier network and enterprise network. The carrier network product group consists primarily of products and solutions for optical-based communications infrastructure for services such as video, data and voice communications. The enterprise network product group consists primarily of optical-based communication networks sold to businesses, governments and individuals for their own use.', '\xa0Our Milpitas, CA Office\xa0', ' ', 'We prohibit discrimination on the basis of race, color, gender, age, religion, national origin, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, disability, or veteran status or any other legally protected status\xa0', 'It’s a Plus if you bring knowledge of NAS, S1AP, 3GPP LTE E-UTRAN and Evolved Packet System ', 'If you’d like to learn more about us, please visit us on LinkedIn: (https://www.linkedin.com/showcase/corning-cable-systems) ', 'This is a meaningful role where you’ll participate in the design, development and maintenance of embedded software for 3G/LTE radio access network and core network protocols and subsystems.\xa0We want someone with a strong work ethic who is responsive and brings strong attention to detail.', 'Our Milpitas, CA Office\xa0', 'What does career growth potential look like?', 'Participate in architecture, design and code reviews and provide peer feedback.', 'Potential career paths include but are not limited to progression into a Technical Lead role or Management, etc. based on the individual. ', 'Visit our website at www.corning.com/careers or apply directly by clicking https://bit.ly/3ffIClB', 'If you have a Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science, Telecommunications (or related field) and bring 5+ years’ experience in embedded C/C++ programming for design and development of communication protocols, you sound like a great fit!\xa0(Master’s Degree preferred)Knowledge of 3GPP specifications, particularly RRC & stellar debugging skills!We want an exceptional understanding and track record in development experience with UMTS and/or LTE radio interface protocols.Bring hands-on experience with layered cellular protocol stack implementation on resource constrained embedded processors using multi-threaded programming model A proven ability to use debug tools and knowledge of runtime environment to efficiently isolate and fix bugs.It’s a Plus if you bring knowledge of NAS, S1AP, 3GPP LTE E-UTRAN and Evolved Packet System Working knowledge of IP protocol stack.', 'Corning is one of the world’s leading innovators in materials science. For more than 160 years, Corning has applied its unparalleled expertise in specialty glass, ceramics, and optical physics to develop products that have created new industries and transformed people’s lives.', 'How do I apply?', 'Bring hands-on experience with layered cellular protocol stack implementation on resource constrained embedded processors using multi-threaded programming model ', 'Work on the integration of radio interface functions with policy, session management and configuration subsystems.', 'What Qualifications do we look for?', 'What does a typical day look like for a Sr. Wireless Software Engineer?', 'We will ensure that individuals with disabilities are provided reasonable accommodation to participate in the job application or interview process, to perform essential job functions, and to receive other benefits and privileges of employment. Please contact us to request accommodation.', 'If you have a Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science, Telecommunications (or related field) and bring 5+ years’ experience in embedded C/C++ programming for design and development of communication protocols, you sound like a great fit!\xa0(Master’s Degree preferred)', 'We prohibit discrimination on the basis of\xa0race, color, gender, age, religion, national origin, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, disability, or veteran status or any other legally protected status.', 'Debug field issues through log analysis and other field data', 'Working knowledge of IP protocol stack.', 'What does a Sr. Wireless Software Engineer at Corning do?', 'Job Location:', 'A proven ability to use debug tools and knowledge of runtime environment to efficiently isolate and fix bugs.', 'We want an exceptional understanding and track record in development experience with UMTS and/or LTE radio interface protocols.', 'Support internal test and QA teams and external field support engineers to complete interoperability and acceptance testing in wireless operator networks.', 'Knowledge of 3GPP specifications, particularly RRC & stellar debugging skills!', 'Position Type: ', 'You will…', 'Full-Time']

We’re looking for smart, enthusiastic, driven individuals who are eager to contribute to our world class solutions.']

['Luxoft has contract with a major Telecommunications provider looking to build a team of strong technical consultants to drive cost savings through data exploration. This agile team will work closely with clients to identify data sources, bring them together and normalize the data structure to be ingested for analytics. The work will be centered around telco network equipment to create a repeatable framework of data exploration. This high visibility project will drive business value realization using big data techniques and agile methodologies.This project will implement a 3 step process including the following:o First to identify the contacts, source of information and availability of data.o Second, using the requirements, develop a pipeline for the data into a normalized structure called the BRD (Business Ready Dataset).o Third will be to automate the process of data acquisition and BRD creation into a production environment with checks and balances (monitoring, etc.).These steps will be implemented by various roles/team members and repeated for multiple equipment types using an Agile team method. ', 'Luxoft has contract with a major Telecommunications provider looking to build a team of strong technical consultants to drive cost savings through data exploration. This agile team will work closely with clients to identify data sources, bring them together and normalize the data structure to be ingested for analytics. The work will be centered around telco network equipment to create a repeatable framework of data exploration. This high visibility project will drive business value realization using big data techniques and agile methodologies.This project will implement a 3 step process including the following:o First to identify the contacts, source of information and availability of data.o Second, using the requirements, develop a pipeline for the data into a normalized structure called the BRD (Business Ready Dataset).o Third will be to automate the process of data acquisition and BRD creation into a production environment with checks and balances (monitoring, etc.).These steps will be implemented by various roles/team members and repeated for multiple equipment types using an Agile team method. Responsibilities: o Development of a self-service platform to be used by our customers driving cost savings initiatives.o Contribute to an Agile team of developers focused on data ingestion across multiple sources.o Operate in a CI/CD environment.o Implement data extraction from various/distributed sources utilizing scripting and storage in a SQL/HSQL environment.o Strong analytical, planning, and organizational skills with an ability to manage competing demandso Strong experience in data exploration with large data sets Mandatory Skills: Scala, Java, HiveQL, SPARK, SQL, Python, Hadoop, Cloud, MySQL   ', 'Responsibilities:', ' ', "This position is open to US Citizens, Green Card Holders, EAD's , H1B Holders working through a subcontractor. Must have a minimum of 4 years in a Big Data Environment and be exprienced working in large data environments with a minimum of 100TB of Data. Scala experience is a must.\xa0 ", 'o Development of a self-service platform to be used by our customers driving cost savings initiatives.o Contribute to an Agile team of developers focused on data ingestion across multiple sources.o Operate in a CI/CD environment.o Implement data extraction from various/distributed sources utilizing scripting and storage in a SQL/HSQL environment.o Strong analytical, planning, and organizational skills with an ability to manage competing demandso Strong experience in data exploration with large data sets ', 'Mandatory Skills:', 'Scala, Java, HiveQL, SPARK, SQL, Python, Hadoop, Cloud, MySQL ', 'Responsibilities: ', 'NO H1b sponsorship will be provided.', 'Mandatory Skills: ']

job_title: Backend Software Engineer, TikTok Creator Marketplace
job_text: ['', '1. Responsible for the development of TikTok influencer marketing-related platforms.', '3. Familiar with the entire software development life cycle including product discussion, research and analysis (demand and supply side) , document writing, system design, coding, testing, etc.', 'TikTok is the leading destination for short-form mobile video. Our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy. TikTok has global offices including Los Angeles, Mountain View, New York, London, Paris, Berlin, Dubai, Mumbai, Singapore, Jakarta, Seoul and Tokyo.', 'Qualifications:', "1. Bachelor's degree or above, majoring in Computer Science or related fields.", 'Responsibilities:', 'TikTok is committed to providing reasonable accommodations during our recruitment process. If you need assistance or an accommodation, please reach out to us at usrc@tiktok.com.', "TikTok Creator Marketplace is the platform for monetization of creators in TikTok. We're dedicated to the realization of cooperation between creators and brands.", '2. Strong knowledge of data structure and algorithms, proficient in at least one coding language, including but not limited to Python, Go, Java.', "TikTok is committed to creating an inclusive space where employees are valued for their skills, experiences, and unique perspectives. Our platform connects people from across the globe and so does our workplace. At TikTok, our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy. To achieve that goal, we are committed to celebrating our diverse voices and to creating an environment that reflects the many communities we reach. We believe individuals shouldn't be disadvantaged because of their background or identity, but instead should be considered based on their strengths and experience. We are passionate about this and hope you are too.", '4. Passion for new technologies and proven capability in analysis and problem-solving.', '2. Understand product objectives, help developing a user-friendly platform to fully meet customer needs.']

relational databases, query authoring (SQL) as well as working familiarity with a variety of SQL and NoSQL databases, including BigQuery (preferable), MySQL/MariaDB, Postgres or Cassandra.Expertise in engineer', 'Work on data software solutions that will transform the consumer lending and blockchain space', 'Ability to thrive in a fast-paced growing company.', 'Comprehensive health, vision, dental insurance', 'Expertise in data modeling for data science, reporting, and analytics, including dimensional and transactional models.\xa0', 'Figure is excited to be growing our businesses and creating new teams.\xa0We are looking for curious, innovative and collaborative team members.\xa0Engineering is at the heart of the action, building out our blockchain protocol and direct to consumer products that will transform the financial services industry.\xa0Everything is from scratch development and every engineer has a big impact on the team and the growth of the company.\xa0', 'Accomplishing this kind of transformation requires building really big things. ", 'Perform data normalization and denormalization where needed.', '\xa0\xa0Writing data pipelines: 4+ years (Preferred)', 'Understand customer requirements and render those as architectural models that will operate at large scale and high performance and advise customers on how to run these architectural models.', 'We are an AWS Advanced level Consulting Partners, hence it gives us an opportunity to work with some of the experts in the AWS community.', 'Must have hands on experience with AWS knowledge.', 'Design and analyze data models, data flows, and integration patterns for structural deficiencies/soundness to build a robust and complete future state model.', 'Works with the teams to plan approach to understand current state architecture', 'Contributing data sources, technologies, interfaces, performance issues and system configurations.', 'Senior Data Engineer ', 'Hands-on experience with commercializing Big Data applications (e.g. configuration management, monitoring, debugging, and security.)', 'Experience implementing Orchestrator like airflow for big data tools.', 'Solid functional understanding of the Open-Source Big Data Technologies and NoSQL databases such as MongoDB or Cassandra.', 'Technical Qualifications:', 'Create/Review logical entities and define their attributes; and define relationships between the various data objects.', '\xa0\xa0AWS Glue/Lambda/EMR/SNS/SQS: 3+ years (Preferred)', '8+ years of experience in Advanced Analytics and Big Data with the minimum implementation of at-least 2-3 projects at the enterprise level.', '\ufeff(Our team is interested to hire a Data Engineer, Data Architect, AWS Solutions Architect or a Cloud Architect as long as the resource has hands-on skills with Spark, Big Data, AWS and Python/Java/Scala).', '\xa0\xa0Python/Spark/Scala: 3+ hands on years (Preferred)', 'Roles and Responsibilities:', 'Effective communicator (both verbal & written).', 'Experience:', '\xa0\xa0Airflow experience: 2+ years (Preferred)', 'Senior Data Engineer', 'Proficiency in one or more modern programming languages like Python or Scala or Spark', 'Experience implementing search functionality using big data tools.', 'Full Job Description', 'IMPORTANT INFO: This is AWS /BIG DATA/ PYSPARK - SPECIFIC POSITION', 'AWS', 'Support multiple Agile Scrum teams with planning, scoping and creation of technical solutions.', 'As we are into both technology consulting services and in the FinTech industry serving banking and financial institutions, this role will have a blend of working hands-on with our team as well as working with our customers in providing on-demand solutions, mostly in AWS environment.', '\xa0\xa0Big Data Analytics: 7 years (Preferred)', 'Hands-on experience in architecting solutions at scale in Big Data.', 'Performance tuning, table partitioning and indexing, process threading, bucketing, UDF and UDAF.', 'Role: ', '\xa0\xa0ETL (Extract Transform Load): 7 years (Preferred)', 'Role:', 'This is AWS /BIG DATA/ PYSPARK - SPECIFIC POSITION', 'IMPORTANT INFO:', 'Apache Spark/Hadoop (Preferred)']

['Luxoft has contract with a major Telecommunications provider looking to build a team of strong technical consultants to drive cost savings through data exploration. This agile team will work closely with clients to identify data sources, bring them together and normalize the data structure to be ingested for analytics. The work will be centered around telco network equipment to create a repeatable framework of data exploration. This high visibility project will drive business value realization using big data techniques and agile methodologies.This project will implement a 3 step process including the following:o First to identify the contacts, source of information and availability of data.o Second, using the requirements, develop a pipeline for the data into a normalized structure called the BRD (Business Ready Dataset).o Third will be to automate the process of data acquisition and BRD creation into a production environment with checks and balances (monitoring, etc.).These steps will be implemented by various roles/team members and repeated for multiple equipment types using an Agile team method. ', 'Luxoft has contract with a major Telecommunications provider looking to build a team of strong technical consultants to drive cost savings through data exploration. This high visibility project will drive business value realization using big data techniques and agile methodologies.This project will implement a 3 step process including the following:o First to identify the contacts, source of information and availability of data.o Second, using the requirements, develop a pipeline for the data into a normalized structure called the BRD (Business Ready Dataset).o Third will be to automate the process of data acquisition and BRD creation into a production environment with checks and balances (monitoring, etc.).These steps will be implemented by various roles/team members and repeated for multiple equipment types using an Agile team method. Responsibilities: o Development of a self-service platform to be used by our customers driving cost savings initiatives.o Contribute to an Agile team of developers focused on data ingestion across multiple sources.o Operate in a CI/CD environment.o Implement data extraction from various/distributed sources utilizing scripting and storage in a SQL/HSQL environment.o Strong analytical, planning, and organizational skills with an ability to manage competing demandso Strong experience in data exploration with large data sets Mandatory Skills: Scala, Java, HiveQL, SPARK, SQL, Python, Hadoop, Cloud, MySQL   ', 'Responsibilities:', ' ', "This position is open to US Citizens, Green Card Holders, EAD's , H1B Holders working through a subcontractor. ['', 'If you want to work with a tight-knit team of sharp technologists to leverage your talents and grow your skills, this is the role for you.', 'If you want to the long-term upside of an equity stake in a scalable business with the short-term upside of profit-sharing, this is the role for you.', 'The developer in this role will contribute to both our SaaS product as well as client-facing Services projects.', 'Company Description', 'Qualifications', 'Converge is a dynamic Marketing Reporting Automation Software Company in Atlanta, funded by Mark Cuban, that has navigated to profitability and is hiring for growth.', 'We are seeking Full Stack Software Developers to work on our Marketing Reporting Automation Platform and a variety of Products for an intriguing range of clients.', "Converge is conveniently located next to Georgia Tech's campus at Tech Square, but we are currently operating almost entirely as a remote team for the convenience and safety of our team.", 'We automate the collection and visualization of social media, digital, and offline marketing data, saving our clients time, increasing their accuracy and job satisfaction, and adding tremendous efficiency to the client reporting process.', 'This is a unique opportunity to work alongside an experienced team that excels at building Software as a Service (SaaS) products.', 'If you are interested in the mix of building a scalable Software-as-a-Service (SAAS) product and consulting for clients (no travel), this is the role for you.', 'We are hiring a Software Engineer to help accelerate our growth.', 'This is a challenging and varied technical role. Experience developing web applications in Ruby on Rails is ideal, though the role also requires a voracious appetite to learn and apply new skills. You should be skilled at building web-based software or mobile apps, and excel at learning new languages and frameworks.', 'Converge is a Marketing Reporting Automation platform that helps Digital Marketing Agencies increase the profitability, accuracy, and efficiency of the reporting they provide to clients every month.']

['', 'QUALIFICATIONS AND EXPERIENCE', 'Experience with D3.js is a plus', 'Design, develop and maintain cloud-based systems and infrastructure.', 'AerNos, Inc. develops application-specific nano gas sensors for detecting harmful gases in the environment and for other electronic nose applications. Our sensors are designed to be easily integrated into consumer and commercial product lines such as standalone monitoring devices, non-stationary devices (drones, industrial robots, construction equipment, etc.), modes of transportation, wearables, smartphones, and IoT devices. AerNos sensors are based on breakthrough and proprietary AerN2S Technology. Proven experience (2 years) with distributed\xa0systems (Mesos, Kubernetes, Spark, Hadoop, distributed databases, grid computing)', '#aptonetjobs', 'Duration: 12 months (extendable w/ possibility of converting to full-time permanent)', '5+ years’ experience with developing ETL/Data Pipeline solutions. ', 'Experience with data privacy concerns ', 'Duration', 'Knowledge of data science practices, to better steer our efforts to support them through the infrastructure we create ', 'Nice to Have: (will get preference) ', 'Location: Chesterfield', 'Work in partnership with data science and visualization teams to understand use cases, data needs, and outcome objectives. Utilizing big data and cloud technologies to develop data pipelines and deliver data sets. As a partner, you will have project work and ad hoc requests that require agility and often fast paced response to business needs. ', 'Required ', 'Location', 'Experience developing and utilizing Data Lakes. ', 'Data Engineer\xa0', 'Ability to perform complex data analysis with large volumes of data. ', 'Ability to build and maintain modern cloud architecture, e.g. AWS, Google Cloud, etc.', '5 years or more experience in Java, Scala or Python. ']

['', 'What You’ll Do', 'Deep experience with data frameworks and tools like Spark, SparkML, Spark Streaming, Apache Beam, and Airflow.', '3+ years’ experience with Spark, either in Python or in Scala. Bonus points for Spark on EMR, Dataproc, or Kubernetes.', "Here's our\xa0Blockchain Business, Provenance", '\xa0', 'http://www.figure.com/blog/series-c', 'As part of our Data Engineering team, you’ll work closely with various business functions to understand Figure’s analytic, data science, and reporting needs and to develop data products that address those needs. You will be contributing to data engineering’s vision and development from day one.', 'Competitive salaryFirm-wide performance based bonusCompetitive stock options packageA flexible paid time off and vacation policyComprehensive health, vision, dental insuranceCompany FSA, 401k, commuter benefitsAnd much more to come!', 'Competitive stock options package', 'About Figure', 'Figure will NOT sponsor work visas for this position. In compliance with federal law, all persons hired will be required to verify identity and eligibility to work in the United States and to complete the required employment eligibility verification form upon hire.', 'Company FSA, 401k, commuter benefits', 'This team has an incredible engineering challenge: integrate very large datasets that outline intricate details about consumers’ credit profiles and real estate holdings, expose those datasets to data scientists in a way that enables their ML and modeling efforts, and shape those models into scalable, production-quality processes. In addition, the team provides the foundations for internal analytics and for internal and external reporting by transforming data from Figure applications and external vendors into clear data models.', 'Leverage Spark, Airflow, Google Kubernetes Engine, BigQuery and other tools to build robust and efficient data pipelines.Expand and optimize our data and data pipeline architecture, as well as optimizing data flow and collection for cross-functional teams.Collaborate with project leads and other software engineers across multiple teamsWork on data software solutions that will transform the consumer lending and blockchain spaceBe a leader, use your voice, apply your tech skills to solve real world problems', 'About the Role', 'Firm-wide performance based bonus', 'Comfort with and experience working within CI/CD processes and tools and software development practices.', 'https://www.provenance.io/about/#hash', 'What We Look For', 'Benefits To You', 'Working knowledge of Google Cloud tools (compute, cloud storage, GKE, GCR, AutoML, etc.)\xa0\xa0', 'At Figure, we’re on a mission to transform financial services through blockchain, bringing speed, efficiency and savings to both consumers and institutions.', 'Expertise building and optimizing data pipelines using Kafka (preferred), Kinesis, or other event bus.', 'Competitive salary', 'Collaborate with project leads and other software engineers across multiple teams', 'This is an opportunity to work with a team of proven leaders who have already created billions of dollars in value in the Fintech space. using Kafka (preferred), Kinesis, or other event bus.Deep experience with data frameworks and tools like Spark, SparkML, Spark Streaming, Apache Beam, and Airflow.Comfort with and experience working within CI/CD processes and tools and software development practices.Experience with production machine learning workflows and processes.Advanced working SQL knowledge and experience working with relational databases, query authoring (SQL) as well as working familiarity with a variety of SQL and NoSQL databases, including BigQuery (preferable), MySQL/MariaDB, Postgres or Cassandra.Expertise in data modeling for data science, reporting, and analytics, including dimensional and transactional models.\xa0Nice to have:\xa0experience building real-time transformations and learning models on streams.Ability to thrive in a fast-paced growing company.', 'Be a leader, use your voice, apply your tech skills to solve real world problems', '6+ years of proven working experience as a data engineer', 'Work on data software solutions that will transform the consumer lending and blockchain space', 'Ability to thrive in a fast-paced growing company.', 'Comprehensive health, vision, dental insurance', 'Expertise in data modeling for data science, reporting, and analytics, including dimensional and transactional models.\xa0', 'Figure is excited to be growing our businesses and creating new teams.\xa0We are looking for curious, innovative and collaborative team members.\xa0Engineering is at the heart of the action, building out our blockchain protocol and direct to consumer products that will transform the financial services industry.\xa0Everything is from scratch development and every engineer has a big impact on the team and the growth of the company.\xa0', 'Accomplishing this kind of transformation requires building really big things. And we understand that building big requires a creative, team oriented and supportive environment where everyone can do their absolute best work. The Figure team is comprised of incredibly driven, innovative, collaborative and curious people who love architecting and building from scratch. Everyone at the company is encouraged to be an individual contributor but also a team collaborator.\xa0', 'We value team members who bring an entrepreneurial mindset to every task and will embrace our culture of innovation. As such, the candidate will be responsible for creating software to aid in data collection and processing. The candidate will also be responsible for producing demo applications that stream live camera data through an image processing and DNN inferencing pipeline and viewing output. ', ' Sense of ownership and pride in one’s work ', ' Cross-platform solutions: environments, build systems, and frameworks (e.g., Docker, CMake, and Qt) ', ' Minimum B.S., M.S. EE or CS preferred, with emphasis on system software, computer vision, machine learning and embedded products ', ' Knowledge and experience with SoCs, imaging systems and the various image file formats ', 'Additional Desired Experience', '  This position is part of the CTO Office team that works on creating significant new product opportunities for Synaptics. The work involves a variety of tasks and responsibilities and is well-suited for a system-level thinker with a broad engineering background and analytical thought processes.   The current projects are focused on computer vision and AI-at-the-edge. As such, the candidate will be responsible for creating software to aid in data collection and processing. The candidate will also be responsible for producing demo applications that stream live camera data through an image processing and DNN inferencing pipeline and viewing output.   The candidate will need to gain a deep understanding of our multimedia SoCs and EVKs, our Embedded Linux and Android SDKs, our SyNAP (Synaptics Neural Network Acceleration and Processing) technology, and how to optimize processing across multiple ARM cores, a GPU and a Neural Processing Unit (NPU).   The candidate will be responsible for architecting, implementing and documenting embedded demo applications and development kits for both internal evaluation and for going to customers for evaluation.   The candidate will be responsible for working with the Computer Vision and Machine Learning team that will create various algorithms and neural network models for integration into our applications as well as working with various other teams across Synaptics to leverage their products and technologies for our work.   The candidate must be self-motivated, customer focused and enjoy challenges. The candidate must also have good written and verbal skills, as interfacing with other members of the team, the company and customers, locally and remotely, is an important facet of the position.  ', '  Minimum B.S., M.S. EE or CS preferred, with emphasis on system software, computer vision, machine learning and embedded products   Experience architecting, developing and implementing software solutions, both in embedded environments (Embedded Linux/Android) as well as on a PC (Windows), preferably for computer vision and machine learning applications   Good overall system knowledge of computer vision solutions, and image flow from the camera sensor, ISP, NPU, and output. Experience with deployment and optimization of machine learning models is desired (e.g., TensorFlow Lite).   Knowledge and experience with SoCs, imaging systems and the various image file formats   Rigorous and methodical approach to problem solving   Experience utilizing statistical and analytical methods to solve complex problems required   Sense of ownership and pride in one’s work  ', ' Rigorous and methodical approach to problem solving ', ' Languages: C++, Java, Python ', ' The candidate will be responsible for architecting, implementing and documenting embedded demo applications and development kits for both internal evaluation and for going to customers for evaluation. ', 'Job Responsibilities', ' ML/AI tools and libraries (e.g., TFLite and ONNX ', 'Required Qualifications', ' The candidate will need to gain a deep understanding of our multimedia SoCs and EVKs, our Embedded Linux and Android SDKs, our SyNAP (Synaptics Neural Network Acceleration and Processing) technology, and how to optimize processing across multiple ARM cores, a GPU and a Neural Processing Unit (NPU). ', ' This position is part of the CTO Office team that works on creating significant new product opportunities for Synaptics. job_text: ['', 'Preferred: experience working with remote teams', 'Design and implement ETL pipelines by using one or many of the open source frameworks', 'Have you streamed a program on Disney+, caught the latest binge-worthy series on Hulu, or tuned in for NFL highlights on social media? If the answer is yes, you have already benefitted from Conviva’s technology.', 'Experience in data analysis and modeling', 'Conviva is the leader in streaming media intelligence, powered by its real-time platform. More than 250 industry leaders and brands – including CBS, CCTV, Cirque Du Soleil, DAZN, Disney+, HBO, Hulu, Sky, Sling TV, TED, Univision, and WarnerMedia – rely on Conviva to maximize their consumer engagement, deliver the quality experiences viewers expect and drive revenue growth. With a global footprint of more than 500 million unique viewers watching 150 billion streams per year across 3 billion applications streaming on devices, Conviva offers streaming providers unmatched scale for continuous video measurement, intelligence and benchmarking across every stream, every screen, every second. Conviva is privately held and headquartered in Silicon Valley, California, with offices around the world. For more information, please visit us at\xa0www.conviva.com.', 'What you get to do:', 'Provide positive culture influence over other team members with code quality, initiatives and execution', 'BS or above in CS or related fieldStrong knowledge of CS fundamentals, data structures and algorithms5+ years of experience in Java, Scala, Python, and/or C++Technical expertise in one or more big data streaming media growth worldwide. As the leader in global streaming media intelligence, Conviva measures in excess of 500 million unique viewers watching 150 billion streams per year with 1.5 trillion real-time transactions per day across more than 180 countries. Join us as we make streaming better.', 'BS or above in CS or related field', 'Conviva is the leader in streaming media intelligence, powered by its real-time platform. With a global footprint of more than 500 million unique viewers watching 150 billion streams per year across 3 billion applications streaming on devices, Conviva offers streaming providers unmatched scale for continuous video measurement, intelligence and benchmarking across every stream, every screen, every second. Conviva is privately held and headquartered in Silicon Valley, California, with offices around the world. ['Luxoft has contract with a major Telecommunications provider looking to build a team of strong technical consultants to drive cost savings through data exploration. This agile team will work closely with clients to identify data sources, bring them together and normalize the data structure to be ingested for analytics. The work will be centered around telco network equipment to create a repeatable framework of data exploration. This high visibility project will drive business value realization using big data techniques and agile methodologies.This project will implement a 3 step process including the following:o First to identify the contacts, source of information and availability of data.o Second, using the requirements, develop a pipeline for the data into a normalized structure called the BRD (Business Ready Dataset).o Third will be to automate the process of data acquisition and BRD creation into a production environment with checks and balances (monitoring, etc.).These steps will be implemented by various roles/team members and repeated for multiple equipment types using an Agile team method. ', 'Luxoft has contract with a major Telecommunications provider looking to build a team of strong technical consultants to drive cost savings through data exploration. This agile team will work closely with clients to identify data sources, bring them together and normalize the data structure to be ingested for analytics. The work will be centered around telco network equipment to create a repeatable framework of data exploration. This high visibility project will drive business value realization using big data techniques and agile methodologies.This project will implement a 3 step process including the following:o First to identify the contacts, source of information and availability of data.o Second, using the requirements, develop a pipeline for the data into a normalized structure called the BRD (Business Ready Dataset).o Third will be to automate the process of data acquisition and BRD creation into a production environment with checks and balances (monitoring, etc.).These steps will be implemented by various roles/team members and repeated for multiple equipment types using an Agile team method. Responsibilities: o Development of a self-service platform to be used by our customers driving cost savings initiatives.o Contribute to an Agile team of developers focused on data ingestion across multiple sources.o Operate in a CI/CD environment.o Implement data extraction from various/distributed sources utilizing scripting and storage in a SQL/HSQL environment.o Strong analytical, planning, and organizational skills with an ability to manage competing demandso Strong experience in data exploration with large data sets Mandatory Skills: Scala, Java, HiveQL, SPARK, SQL, Python, Hadoop, Cloud, MySQL   ', 'Responsibilities:', ' ', "This position is open to US Citizens, Green Card Holders, EAD's , H1B Holders working through a subcontractor. Must have a minimum of 4 years in a Big Data Environment and be exprienced working in large data environments with a minimum of 100TB of Data. Scala experience is a must.\xa0 ", 'o Development of a self-service platform to be used by our customers driving cost savings initiatives.o Contribute to an Agile team of developers focused on data ingestion across multiple sources.o Operate in a CI/CD environment.o Implement data extraction from various/distributed sources utilizing scripting and storage in a SQL/HSQL environment.o Strong analytical, planning, and organizational skills with an ability to manage competing demandso Strong experience in data exploration with large data sets ', 'Mandatory Skills:', 'Scala, Java, HiveQL, SPARK, SQL, Python, Hadoop, Cloud, MySQL ', 'Responsibilities: ', 'NO H1b sponsorship will be provided.', 'Mandatory Skills: ']

['', 'If you want to work with a tight-knit team of sharp technologists to leverage your talents and grow your skills, this is the role for you.', 'If you want to the long-term upside of an equity stake in a scalable business with the short-term upside of profit-sharing, this is the role for you.', 'The developer in this role will contribute to both our SaaS product as well as client-facing Services projects.', 'Company Description', 'Qualifications', 'Converge is a dynamic Marketing Reporting Automation Software Company in Atlanta, funded by Mark Cuban, that has navigated to profitability and is hiring for growth.', 'We are seeking Full Stack Software Developers to work on our Marketing Reporting Automation Platform and a variety of Products for an intriguing range of clients.', "Converge is conveniently located next to Georgia Tech's campus at Tech Square, but we are currently operating almost entirely as a remote team for the convenience and safety of our team.", 'We automate the collection and visualization of social media, digital, and offline marketing data, saving our clients time, increasing their accuracy and job satisfaction, and adding tremendous efficiency to the client reporting process.', 'This is a unique opportunity to work alongside an experienced team that excels at building Software as a Service (SaaS) products.', 'If you are interested in the mix of building a scalable Software-as-a-Service (SAAS) product and consulting for clients (no travel), this is the role for you.', 'We are hiring a Software Engineer to help accelerate our growth.', 'This is a challenging and varied technical role. Experience developing web applications in Ruby on Rails is ideal, though the role also requires a voracious appetite to learn and apply new skills. You should be skilled at building web-based software or mobile apps, and excel at learning new languages and frameworks.', 'Converge is a Marketing Reporting Automation platform that helps Digital Marketing Agencies increase the profitability, accuracy, and efficiency of the reporting they provide to clients every month.']

"Confidence can sometimes hold us back from applying for a job. But we'll let you in on a secret: there's no such thing as a 'perfect' candidate. HubSpot is a place where everyone can grow. So however you identify and whatever background you bring with you, please apply if this is a role that would make you excited to come into work every day.About HubSpotHubSpot helps millions of organizations grow better, and we’d love to grow better with you. Our business builds the software and systems that power the world’s small to medium-sized businesses. Our company culture builds connections, careers, and employee growth. How? By creating a workplace that values flexibility, autonomy, and transparency. If that sounds like something you’d like to be part of, we’d love to hear from you.You can find out more about our company culture in the HubSpot Culture Code, which has more than 4M views, and learn about our commitment to creating a diverse and inclusive workplace, too. Thanks to the work of every HubSpotter globally who has helped build our remarkable culture, HubSpot has been named a top workplace by Glassdoor, Fortune, Entrepreneur, and more.HubSpot was founded in 2006. Design, build, and maintain data-driven test automation tools and frameworks using clean coding practices and functional programming methodologies. Perform debugging and root cause analysis of product issues or defects. Perform system analysis, assess risk, and develop strong test strategies by analyzing product design and technical specifications, and by collaborating with product managers and developers. Integrate with deployment infrastructure to establish a continuous build and test cycle. Perform test environment set up and configuration. Evangelize new testing methodologies, best practices and tools with goals to continuously improve test coverage through automation. job_title: Software Engineer in Test III (Java + Automation)
job_text: ['', ' Responsible for supporting test infrastructure of our software systems and components. Design, build, and maintain data-driven test automation tools and frameworks using clean coding practices and functional programming methodologies. Perform debugging and root cause analysis of product issues or defects. Perform system analysis, assess risk, and develop strong test strategies by analyzing product design and technical specifications, and by collaborating with product managers and developers. Integrate with deployment infrastructure to establish a continuous build and test cycle. Perform test environment set up and configuration. Evangelize new testing methodologies, best practices and tools with goals to continuously improve test coverage through automation. Report, document, and communicate failures discovered through testing with the affected teams. Hands-on experience with Enterprise class Relational Database Management System (RDBMS) such as Microsoft SQL Server and PostgreSQL, as well as DocumentDBs such as DynamoDB and MongoDBHands-on experience with event streaming architectures and technologies such as Apache Kafka and AWS Kinesis What does this look like? job_title: Software Engineer in Test III (Java + Automation)
job_text: ['', ' Responsible for supporting test infrastructure of our software systems and components. Design, build, and maintain data-driven test automation tools and frameworks using clean coding practices and functional programming methodologies. Perform debugging and root cause analysis of product issues or defects. Perform system analysis, assess risk, and develop strong test strategies by analyzing product design and technical specifications, and by collaborating with product managers and developers. Integrate with deployment infrastructure to establish a continuous build and test cycle. Perform test environment set up and configuration. Evangelize new testing methodologies, best practices and tools with goals to continuously improve test coverage through automation. Report, document, and communicate failures discovered through testing with the affected teams. Fastly encourages applicants from all backgrounds.', 'We', 'Support core UI library functionality to streamline feature development ', 'have', 'Experience testing, debugging, and confidently deploying frontend applications', 'distributed', 'a', 'you.', 'value', ' We have a huge impact. Fastly is a small company with a big reach. Not only do our customers have a tremendous user base, but we also support a growing number of open source projects and initiatives. Outside of code, employees are encouraged to share causes close to their heart with others so we can help lend a supportive hand. We love distributed teams. Fastly’s home-base is in San Francisco, but we have multiple offices and employees sprinkled around the globe. In fact, 50% of our employees work outside of SF! An international remote culture is in our DNA. We care about you. Fastly works hard to create a positive environment for our employees, and we think your life outside of work is important too. We support our teams with great benefits like up to 20 weeks of paid parental leave, options for free medical/dental/vision plans, and an open vacation program that enables our folks to take the time they need to recharge (some benefits may vary by location). We value diversity. Growing and maintaining our inclusive and diverse team matters to us. We are committed to being a company where our employees feel comfortable bringing their authentic selves to work and have the ability to be successful -- every day. We are passionate. Fastly is chock full of passionate people and we’re not ‘one size fits all’. Fastly employs authors, pilots, skiers, parents (of humans and animals), makeup geeks, coffee connoisseurs, and more. We love employees for who they are and what they are passionate about. ', 'teams.', 'We are passionate. Fastly is chock full of passionate people and we’re not ‘one size fits all’. job_title: Software Engineer in Test III (Java + Automation)
job_text: ['', ' Responsible for supporting test infrastructure of our software systems and components. Design, build, and maintain data-driven test automation tools and frameworks using clean coding practices and functional programming methodologies. Perform debugging and root cause analysis of product issues or defects. Perform system analysis, assess risk, and develop strong test strategies by analyzing product design and technical specifications, and by collaborating with product managers and developers. Integrate with deployment infrastructure to establish a continuous build and test cycle. Perform test environment set up and configuration. Evangelize new testing methodologies, best practices and tools with goals to continuously improve test coverage through automation. Report, document, and communicate failures discovered through testing with the affected teams. job_title: Software Engineer in Test III (Java + Automation)
job_text: ['', ' Responsible for supporting test infrastructure of our software systems and components. Design, build, and maintain data-driven test automation tools and frameworks using clean coding practices and functional programming methodologies. Perform debugging and root cause analysis of product issues or defects. Perform system analysis, assess risk, and develop strong test strategies by analyzing product design and technical specifications, and by collaborating with product managers and developers. Integrate with deployment infrastructure to establish a continuous build and test cycle. Perform test environment set up and configuration. Evangelize new testing methodologies, best practices and tools with goals to continuously improve test coverage through automation. Report, document, and communicate failures discovered through testing with the affected teams. Work closely with developers in all phases of SDLC to build quality into our development process.', 'Email Your Resume In Word To', ' Perform system analysis, assess risk, and develop strong test strategies by analyzing product design and technical specifications, and by collaborating with product managers and developers.', 'Optello is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer', 'Please do NOT change the email subject line in any way. Experience with high transaction enterprise systems. Experience with 3rd party logging solutions such as NLog, Log4Net, ELMAH. Experience with 3rd party monitoring solutions such as datadog, dynatrace, Stackify, ANTS profiler, etc. Experience with modern data frameworks such as Entity Framework, Dapper, or NHibernate. Experience with HTML/JavaScript/JQuery and modern UI framework experience such as AngularJS or React. AWS experience. Kubernetes and Docker. Asynchronous and fault-tolerant programming practices using modern MQ technologies.', ' Healthcare or finance experience.', 'Job Details', 'Benefits', ' Make others better through code reviews, documentation, technical guidance, and mentoring.', ' Build microservices and REST APIs capable of handling high volume traffic. Implement well structured, unit tested, clean, and maintainable code. Collaborate with the Products group to understand user and business needs, and work on execution plans. Make others better through code reviews, documentation, technical guidance, and mentoring.', ' Experience with modern data frameworks such as Entity Framework, Dapper, or NHibernate.', ' Build microservices and REST APIs capable of handling high volume traffic.', ' Significant experience with API development and microservices.', 'Requirements', ' Experience with high transaction enterprise systems.', ' Asynchronous and fault-tolerant programming practices using modern MQ technologies.', ' Experience with 3rd party logging solutions such as NLog, Log4Net, ELMAH.', ' Kubernetes and Docker.', ' Experience with 3rd party monitoring solutions such as datadog, dynatrace, Stackify, ANTS profiler, etc.', ' Strong programming experience with SQL Server as a data store (Transactions, locking etc.)', ' Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science or related category, or demonstrable equivalent experience. At least 4 years of software development experience including 1 in a senior role. Significant experience with API development and microservices. Expert knowledge and experience with C#. Strong programming experience with SQL Server as a data store (Transactions, locking etc.) Strong written and verbal communication skills.', ' AWS experience.', ' Collaborate with the Products group to understand user and business needs, and work on execution plans.', ' Work with your team and engineering management to develop new architectures and strategies to deliver value.', 'Why join us?', ' Expert knowledge and experience with C#.']
