Make others better through code reviews, documentation, technical guidance, and mentoring.', ' Experience with modern data frameworks such as Entity Framework, Dapper, or NHibernate.', ' Build microservices and REST APIs capable of handling high volume traffic.', ' Significant experience with API development and microservices.', 'Requirements', ' Experience with high transaction enterprise systems.', ' Asynchronous and fault-tolerant programming practices using modern MQ technologies.', ' Experience with 3rd party logging solutions such as NLog, Log4Net, ELMAH.', ' Kubernetes and Docker.', ' Experience with 3rd party monitoring solutions such as datadog, dynatrace, Stackify, ANTS profiler, etc.', ' Strong programming experience with SQL Server as a data store (Transactions, locking etc.)', ' Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science or related category, or demonstrable equivalent experience. At least 4 years of software development experience including 1 in a senior role. Significant experience with API development and microservices. Expert knowledge and experience with C#. Strong programming experience with SQL Server as a data store (Transactions, locking etc.) Strong written and verbal communication skills.', ' AWS experience.', ' Collaborate with the Products group to understand user and business needs, and work on execution plans.', ' Work with your team and engineering management to develop new architectures and strategies to deliver value.', 'Why join us?', ' Expert knowledge and experience with C#.']

job_title: Customer Support Engineer - Systems Admin - C++, Linux/UNIX - Market Data
job_text: ['', ' Project management, educating customers on best practices associated with company hardware-accelerated appliances, as well as change management to deploy the latest product versions using global managed services infrastructure.  Be the first point of contact (after the Service Desk) for providing quick response to problems, configuration changes, or software fixes as needed, and is the primary point of contact for critical issues.  Serves as the incident manager for all operational issues that require escalation and coordination with customer technical teams. T Position involves providing technical support to customers and providing technical assistance to pre-sales engagements. Position involves planning and overseeing of upgrades and new deployments of company products. Provide technical support of all company products to customers and to company personnel (Sales, Field Engineering, Product Engineering). Deliver timely and clear status updates to customers and to company management. Work with Engineering, Product Engineering, and Field Engineering to resolve customer issues in a timely fashion. Work closely with the Operations team to resolve systems issues and communicate them effectively with the customer.', 'A Bit About Us', ' 10+ years of experience in the development or technical management of financial technology or enterprise data processing products.', ' 8+ years of experience in the development or technical management of electronic trading applications.', ' Excellent administrative and project management skills.', ' Work with Engineering, Product Engineering, and Field Engineering to resolve customer issues in a timely fashion.', ' Deliver timely and clear status updates to customers and to company management.', ' Project management, educating customers on best practices associated with company hardware-accelerated appliances, as well as change management to deploy the latest product versions using global managed services infrastructure. ', ' Experience in Trading floor support of production support of trading desks.', ' Position involves providing technical support to customers and providing technical assistance to pre-sales engagements.', ' 8+ years of experience in customer engagement in pre-sales or post-sales support engineering.', 'Customer Support Engineer with system administration experience along with Market Data, C++ and Linux/UNIX experience.', ' Minimum BS Computer Science, Software Engineering, Electrical Engineering, or equivalent.', ' Minimum BS Computer Science, Software Engineering, Electrical Engineering, or equivalent. Experience in financial market data or other front-office financial technology is extremely beneficial. 10+ years of experience in the development or technical management of financial technology or enterprise data processing products. 8+ years of experience in the development or technical management of electronic trading applications. 8+ years of experience in customer engagement in pre-sales or post-sales support engineering. Experience in Trading floor support of production support of trading desks. Familiarity with current market data products, APIs, and system architectures is strongly desired; examples include Activ Financial, Bloomberg, Thomson Reuters, and SR Labs.  Working knowledge of network communication protocols including IP, UDP, and TCP/IP. Working knowledge of Object-Oriented design and C, C++, and/or Java programming languages. Working knowledge of Linux/UNIX and Windows operating systems. Excellent administrative and project management skills.', ' Be the first point of contact (after the Service Desk) for providing quick response to problems, configuration changes, or software fixes as needed, and is the primary point of contact for critical issues. ', 'Job Details', ' Experience in financial market data or other front-office financial technology is extremely beneficial.', ' Familiarity with current market data products, APIs, and system architectures is strongly desired; examples include Activ Financial, Bloomberg, Thomson Reuters, and SR Labs. job_title: Customer Support Engineer - Systems Admin - C++, Linux/UNIX - Market Data
job_text: ['', ' Project management, educating customers on best practices associated with company hardware-accelerated appliances, as well as change management to deploy the latest product versions using global managed services infrastructure.  Be the first point of contact (after the Service Desk) for providing quick response to problems, configuration changes, or software fixes as needed, and is the primary point of contact for critical issues.  Serves as the incident manager for all operational issues that require escalation and coordination with customer technical teams. T Position involves providing technical support to customers and providing technical assistance to pre-sales engagements. Position involves planning and overseeing of upgrades and new deployments of company products. Provide technical support of all company products to customers and to company personnel (Sales, Field Engineering, Product Engineering). Deliver timely and clear status updates to customers and to company management. Work with Engineering, Product Engineering, and Field Engineering to resolve customer issues in a timely fashion. Work closely with the Operations team to resolve systems issues and communicate them effectively with the customer.', 'A Bit About Us', ' 10+ years of experience in the development or technical management of financial technology or enterprise data processing products.', ' 8+ years of experience in the development or technical management of electronic trading applications.', ' Excellent administrative and project management skills.', ' Work with Engineering, Product Engineering, and Field Engineering to resolve customer issues in a timely fashion.', ' Deliver timely and clear status updates to customers and to company management.', ' Project management, educating customers on best practices associated with company hardware-accelerated appliances, as well as change management to deploy the latest product versions using global managed services infrastructure. ', ' Experience in Trading floor support of production support of trading desks.', ' Position involves providing technical support to customers and providing technical assistance to pre-sales engagements.', ' 8+ years of experience in customer engagement in pre-sales or post-sales support engineering.', 'Customer Support Engineer with system administration experience along with Market Data, C++ and Linux/UNIX experience.', ' Minimum BS Computer Science, Software Engineering, Electrical Engineering, or equivalent.', ' Minimum BS Computer Science, Software Engineering, Electrical Engineering, or equivalent. Experience in financial market data or other front-office financial technology is extremely beneficial. 10+ years of experience in the development or technical management of financial technology or enterprise data processing products. 8+ years of experience in the development or technical management of electronic trading applications. 8+ years of experience in customer engagement in pre-sales or post-sales support engineering. Experience in Trading floor support of production support of trading desks. Familiarity with current market data products, APIs, and system architectures is strongly desired; examples include Activ Financial, Bloomberg, Thomson Reuters, and SR Labs.  Working knowledge of network communication protocols including IP, UDP, and TCP/IP. Working knowledge of Object-Oriented design and C, C++, and/or Java programming languages. Working knowledge of Linux/UNIX and Windows operating systems. Excellent administrative and project management skills.', ' Be the first point of contact (after the Service Desk) for providing quick response to problems, configuration changes, or software fixes as needed, and is the primary point of contact for critical issues. ', 'Job Details', ' Experience in financial market data or other front-office financial technology is extremely beneficial.', ' Familiarity with current market data products, APIs, and system architectures is strongly desired; examples include Activ Financial, Bloomberg, Thomson Reuters, and SR Labs. ', 'Responsibilities', 'Requirements', ' Working knowledge of Object-Oriented design and C, C++, and/or Java programming languages.', ' Working knowledge of Linux/UNIX and Windows operating systems.', ' Position involves planning and overseeing of upgrades and new deployments of company products.', ' Provide technical support of all company products to customers and to company personnel (Sales, Field Engineering, Product Engineering).', 'Why join us?', ' Working knowledge of network communication protocols including IP, UDP, and TCP/IP.', ' Work closely with the Operations team to resolve systems issues and communicate them effectively with the customer.', ' Serves as the incident manager for all operational issues that require escalation and coordination with customer technical teams.
